String.Source: Haircut
Haircut
Not interested
Not interested
Haircut
Haircut
Change Appearance
Haircut
Haircut
Trade
Trade
Trade
Trade
Trade
Trade
Trade
Trade
Trade
Trade
Trade
Trade
Trade
Trade
Trade
Trade
Trade
Trade
Trade
Trade
Trade
Trade
What's the news?
Good to see you, Overseer.
Hello, Overseer.
Vault 88 is conveniently located near downtown Quincy. Apply in person to Overseer Barstow.
String.Dest: !Vault 88 se nachází v blízkosti centra města Quincy. Obrať se osobně na správce Barstow.

String.Source: Attention, people of the Commonwealth. Vault 88 is now accepting applications for the first time in 200 years.
String.Dest: !Zpozorněte lidé v Commonwealth. Po 200 letech Vault 88 přijímá žádosti k osídlení.

String.Source: Vault-Tec's motto has never been more apropos: "Better Living Underground".
String.Dest: !Heslo Vaut-Tec nebylo nikdy víc aktuální: „Ti nejlepší žijí pod zemí“.

String.Source: If you're looking for a safe, secure place to settle, consider joining our soon-to-be thriving community.
String.Dest: !Pokud hledáš bezpečné a chráněné místo k žití, pouvažuj připojit se k našemu prosperujícímu společenství.

String.Source: I am pleased to announce that Vault 88 is accepting candidates to live in style. Underground.
String.Dest: !S potěšením oznamuji, že Vault 88 přijímá kandidáty žít ve velkém stylu... a v podzemí.

String.Source: The entrance to Vault 88 is located in Quincy Quarry. Start your new, better life today.
String.Dest: Vchod do Vaultu 88 se nachází v lomu u Quincy. Tam začíná nový a lepší život.

String.Source: I lost track. Does it really matter?
String.Dest: !Já nevím, ale jaký je v tom rozdíl?

String.Source: You're kidding, right? Radscorpion. All the way.
String.Dest: !Děláš si srandu, že? Radšorpioni a celou cestu?

String.Source: Is it night or day? I've lost track.
String.Dest: !Je den nebo noc? Utápím se v tom...

String.Source: Day. Definitely day.
Stay sharp! The Overseer's watching us!
You're imagining things.
Who cares? Super Mutant Behemoth vs. Deathclaw. Now that's a REAL fight.
String.Dest: Koho to zajímá? Supermutant behemoth proti páračovi. To je skutečný boj.

String.Source: What? You mean now? RIGHT now?
I know! It's a little creepy, isn't it?
String.Dest: !Já vím! Je to trochu hrůzostrašné, že ano?

String.Source: Hmmm... Scorpion against bear... Gotta go bear.
String.Dest: !Hmmm... Škorpion proti medvědovi... Medvěd musí vyhrát.

String.Source: What would win in a fight? A Radscorpion or a Yao Guai?
String.Dest: !Co myslíš, kdo by vyhrál boj? Radškorpion nebo Yao Guai?

String.Source: Night. I think.
I'm just so happy I could burst! But don't worry... I won't.
String.Dest: !Jsem tak rád... mohl jsem vybuchnout! Buďte ale bez starosti... nevybuchnu.

String.Source: Aw, that's so sweet of you. How about a lighthouse?
String.Dest: Ó, to je od tebe milé. A co třeba něco o majáku?

String.Source: Oh. Well. Um... Isn't that... sweet?
String.Dest: !Oh, dobře. Uf... asi to není... příjemné?

String.Source: How about "perambulate"?
Ugh. I have this itch. I don't suppose you could... you know.
String.Dest: !Fuj, mám z toho kopřivku. Doufám, nemáte v úmyslu... víte asi co.

String.Source: Why do they have to fight? Why can't they just be friends and go grab coffee?
String.Dest: !Proč musí stále bojovat? Proč si nemohou, jako přátelé, vypít dobrou kávu?

String.Source: Another wonderful day in the Vault!
Who do you think would win in a fight, a lumberjack with tentacle arms, or a shark riding a unicycle?
String.Dest: !Kdo myslíte, že by v boji vyhrál. Dřevorubec, s chapadly místo rukou, nebo žralok, jedoucí na jednokolce?

String.Source: It's just you.
Fine by me. I'll blindly follow anyone with a title and authority.
String.Dest: !U mě dobrý. Klidně poslechnu každého s titulem a autoritou.

String.Source: The day that happens is the day I wander into the Wasteland.
String.Dest: !V den, kdy se to stane, odejdu do Pustiny.

String.Source: Oh, a corpse! Isn't that pleasant.
Oh my goodness! Thank you so much. I appreciate everything you do, too.
String.Dest: !Ó nebesa! Děkuju mnohokrát. Oceňuji všechno, co děláte.

String.Source: Hmmm. I mean, it's hard to beat a shark. But lumberjacks are really tough. I just can't decide.
String.Dest: !Hmm, myslím... těžké mlátit chapadlama žraloka, ale dřevorubci jsou tuzí. Nějak se nemohu rozhodnout.

String.Source: You know, I think it is. Someone needs to check the seals on the Vault door.
String.Dest: !Víte, myslím, že ano. Někdo musí zkontrolovat utěsnění dveří Vaultu.

String.Source: Yes! The others told me! It sounds so... dangerous!
String.Dest: !Ano! Řekli mi to! Zní to tak... nebezpečně!

String.Source: Touch you? I... I mean... scratch your... body?
String.Dest: !Dotknout se vás? Myslím... poškrábat... třeba na zádech?

String.Source: Looks like I turned my frown upside down permanently!
String.Dest: !Moje podoba se změnila na svraštěný pohled... trvale a nenávratně!

String.Source: Oh, you mean that, er... situation? With the thing? Oh, I heard all right.
String.Dest: !Oh, myslíš tu... situaci? Okolo té věci? Ó ano, slyšet to bylo dobře.

String.Source: Nobody's home. See what I did there?
String.Dest: !Nikdo tam není. Mám se tam podívat?

String.Source: Hey, more fertilizer! Too soon?
String.Dest: !Hej! Víc umělého hnojiva! Nebo je to příliš brzo?

String.Source: Aggh! Somebody's knocking on the Vault door! It's a Raider! He'll kill us all!
String.Dest: !Grr! Kdosi buší na dveře Vaultu! To budou nájezdníci! Všechny nás zabijou!

String.Source: Working next to a dead body. Not great for my productivity...
String.Dest: !Makat vedle mrtvoly? To na výkonnosti nepřidá...

String.Source: Is it true what they're saying? About... you know who?
String.Dest: !Je pravda, co říkají? Asi... vy víte kdo?

String.Source: Everything is just... perfect.
Depends. What color is the unicycle?
String.Dest: !To záleží na okolnostech. Jakou barvu má ta jednokolka?

String.Source: Of course! Always happy to help a friend in need.
Knock knock.
Hey, did you hear what they were talking about last night?
String.Dest: !Hej! Už víte, o čem včera večer mluvili?

String.Source: Finally, somebody recognizes how invaluable I am!
I know! I can't believe she did that! The nerve of some people.
String.Dest: !Vím! Nevěřím, že to udělala! Zřejmě neuróza některých lidí.

String.Source: A drawing of the Overseer. Now THAT would be something...
String.Dest: Plány správce. To by bylo něco...

String.Source: Sure is. And he seemed like such a nice guy.
I'm writing a new song, praising the Overseer. I need a word that rhymes with "great."
String.Dest: !Píši oslavnou píseň na správce. Potřebuji slovo, které se rýmuje se slovem „velká“.

String.Source: Really? I think you'd make a great Overseer!
String.Dest: !Skutečně? Myslíš si, že je na správce něco velkého?

String.Source: "Vertebrate"? "Stablemate"? "Encapsulate"? Or maybe just "ate."
Is it drafty in here, or is it just me?
String.Dest: !Je tu průvan, nebo se mi to jen zdá?

String.Source: Yeeeeaaah. Not gonna happen.
Tell me about it. Life in the Vault, huh?
I'd take care of the body myself, but the smell might be a bit much.
String.Dest: !Sám bych o tělo pečoval, ale té „vůně“ by mohlo být trochu moc.

String.Source: No thanks. I've seen your drawings...
I really hope everyone else is as happy as I am.
String.Dest: !Věřím, že i všichni ostatní jsou tak šťestní, jako já.

String.Source: Okay, I don't like to spread rumors. But have you heard about... the thing?
String.Dest: !V pořádku, nerad šířím fámy, ale slyšeli jste o... té věci?

String.Source: No, I haven't. Is it anything like... the whatchamacallit?
String.Dest: !Ne, nemám. Je to něco jako... volání?

String.Source: Well, I have, but I don't believe it.
Wow. Heck of a day, huh?
Right? But I wouldn't trade it for anything.
String.Dest: !V pořádku? Ale já bych ho za nic nevyměnil.

String.Source: I don't want to toot my own horn, but rumor has it I'll be the next Overseer.
String.Dest: !Nechci šířit svůj věhlas, ale cosi mi našeptává, že budu příští správce.

String.Source: You can say that again.
What? No! Of course it isn't true! Really, you can't believe everything you hear...
String.Dest: !Co? Ne! Samozřejmě, že to není pravda! Fakt, nemůžeš věřit všemu, co slyšíš...

String.Source: I really hope not. I hate the idea of living in the same Vault with a person like that.
String.Dest: !Upřímně doufám, že ne. Hnusí se mi myšlenka žít s někým takovým v jednom Vaultu.

String.Source: I want to draw you a picture later. Any requests?
Oh, I know - "super amazingly great"!
The environmental controls may be on the fritz again. Can't say I'm surprised.
String.Dest: !Může se stát, že něco nebude fungovat. Taková věc mě nepřekvapí.

String.Source: Smells like something died in here... Oh.
String.Dest: !Páchne to tu, jakoby něco zemřelo... Oh.

String.Source: I didn't, no. But that's okay. Unlike some people, I don't like to spread gossip...
String.Dest: !Ne, já ne, ale to je v pořádku. Jako někteří, neroznáším drby...

String.Source: No. NO. Please, no "knock knock" jokes...
That has GOT to be a health violation.
Not a care in the world!
Hey, I just wanted to say... I really appreciate everything you do for the Vault.
String.Dest: !Hej! Chtěla jsem jen říct... opravdu si vážím všeho, co pro Vault děláte.

String.Source: Come back when you're ready for a new look.
String.Dest: !Vrať se, až budete připraven na další obrázek.

String.Source: Stop by again when you're ready.
Sit down, and tell me what you're looking for.
String.Dest: !Sedni si a pověz, co tě trápí.

String.Source: You look like someone who could use a haircut.
String.Dest: !Vypadáš jako někdo, kdo umí upravit účes.

String.Source: Yeah, I wouldn't let me work on my face either.
String.Dest: !Jo, jen tak někdo se mi do tváře podepsat nemůže.

String.Source: Great. Have a seat and I'll see what I can do for you.
String.Dest: !Výborně. Přijmi místo a uvidíme, co pro vás mohu udělat.

String.Source: Have a seat, and I'll get to work.
String.Dest: !Posaď se a dám se do práce.

String.Source: I need a new look.
Looking for a new face?
Looking for a new style?
Looking for a haircut?
Okay, good.
It's a big decision. I understand.
Oh, really? OK... um, sit in the chair and I'll do my best.
String.Dest: !Óh! Skutečně? OK... eh, posaďte se na židli, udělám, co je v mých silách.

String.Source: I need a new face.
Take your time. I'll be here.
Can I take a little off the top?
I could use a haircut.
Okay. I'll be here.
Go ahead and sit down.
Smart. I have this book, but... well, lets just say I'm not the most experienced surgeon around.
String.Dest: !Mám sice chytrou knihu, ale... musím říct, že nejsem zrovna zkušený chirurg.

String.Source: Oh, good. Just between you and me, I'm not one hundred percent sure I know what I'm doing.
String.Dest: !Oh, skvělé. Jen tak mezi námi... nejsem si tak jist, co mám vůbec dělat.

String.Source: Some other time, then.
Time for a new look, huh? Sit down and I'll get started.
String.Dest: !Příležitost pro novou vizáž, jú? Sedni si a já to nastartuju.

String.Source: Just sit in the chair, and I'll make you look great.
String.Dest: !Stačí si sednout na židli, umím dělat zázraky.

String.Source: Probably a smart move, to be honest.
Good idea. Definitely think it over.
We can get started as soon as you sit in the chair.
I need a haircut.
Nothing, really. Pretty quiet.
Please, sit. Nothing to be nervous about.
I'm ready when you are. Just have a seat.
String.Dest: !Čekám jenom na znamení. Stačí se posadit.

String.Source: I can change your face for you.
I can give you a new face, if you're interested.
Can't say anything comes to mind.
String.Dest: Nemůžu říct, že by mě něco napadalo.

String.Source: Ok. I can do this. Yeah. Go ahead and sit down in the chair and don't worry about a thing.
String.Dest: !Ok, je to moje práce. Stačí sednout na židli, starosti nechte na mě.

String.Source: I've decided to change my face.
Ah, okay, I'm sure it'll be fine. I can do this. Just sit down in the chair.
String.Dest: !Oh dobrá, určitě to bude v pořádku, je to moje práce. Stačí sednout na židli.

String.Source: I can resculpt your face if you like.
Time to go under the knife, doc.
Don't worry, I'll be fine as soon as I get started.
String.Dest: !Nedělej si starosti, jakmile začnu, budu v pořádku.

String.Source: Oh, of course.
It's great of the Overseer to give us breaks like this, huh?
String.Dest: !To je skvělé od správce, dala nám pauzu, ju?

String.Source: Mmm.
This is delicious.
Anything for you, Overseer.
String.Dest: !Udělám vše, co ti na očích uvidím, správce.

String.Source: Yes, sir.
Sure thing.
Yes, ma'am.
Whatever you need, Overseer.
This cycle is the best. Seriously!
Was that... a kitty cat? Huh?
Never thought I'd be a doctor. Huh.
String.Dest: !Nikdy jsem nemyslel, že budu doktor. Huh.

String.Source: Why do I keep thinking of the Overseer?
Have you tried this? Oh man. Woo!
All the soda you can drink.
Are slot machines supposed to flash?
This thing's not going to hurt, right?
Who knew exercise could be so... wow!
String.Dest: !Kdo umí cvičit, mohl by být... no teda!

String.Source: You got to try this... slot machine. It's the best.
String.Dest: Musíš zkusit tento... automat. Je nejlepší.

String.Source: I could cycle all day. This is... great!
String.Dest: !Mohl bych šlapat třeba celý den. Tohle je... super!

String.Source: I could drink this forever and ever. And then stop!
String.Dest: !Tohle jde pít navěky věků. Než to se mnou sekne!

String.Source: It's kind of... relaxing.
Try not to blink.
The thing's broke. It keeps making weird clicking noises.
String.Dest: !Ta věc je rozbitá. Neustále dělá podivné cvakavé zvuky.

String.Source: Not a bad job, manning the Soda Fountain.
String.Dest: !Není to špatná práce, obsluhovat Soda Fountain.

String.Source: I figured coming down here my days of starving would be over.
String.Dest: !Chápu, že zde dole, by dny hladovění mohly skončit.

String.Source: This is for your own good, I promise.
String.Dest: !To je pro tvé vlastní dobro, slibuji.

String.Source: Eye care's important.
Got to keep going... Otherwise... Ow. Fuck!
Water's too scarce down here.
I had no idea there were so many eye conditions.
String.Dest: !Až teď se dozvídám, že existuje tolik očních chorob.

String.Source: All the flashes. Kind of makes me nervous.
This soda's better than Nuka-Cola. Try it, you'll see.
String.Dest: !Tahle sodovka je lepší, než Nuka-Cola. Zkus a uvidíš.

String.Source: It ain't Nuka-Cola, but the soda's free.
It smells. But... well, in a good way.
String.Dest: !To smrdí. Ale... no, v dobrém slova smyslu.

String.Source: I feel so... pumped. Woo!
There ain't enough beds to go around.
String.Dest: !Asi tu je málo postelí, když chodí pořád dokola.

String.Source: I've almost figured out how this thing works. I think.
String.Dest: !Skoro jsem pochopit, jak ta věc funguje. Myslím.

String.Source: Anybody need help with anything?
I need to eat. But when I think about it... It just makes me sick.
String.Dest: !Pořád musím jíst. Když o tom ale přemýšlím... dělá se mi z toho špatně.

String.Source: I don't think I ever want to go up top again, Overseer.
String.Dest: !Nemyslím si, že bych někdy chtěl odejít, správce.

String.Source: Did the machine just say "degenerate"?
I'm just doing what I'm told, you know.
String.Dest: !Dělám jen to, co mi bylo řečeno. Jak vidíš.

String.Source: Happy to be safe in a Vault, Overseer.
String.Dest: !Je štěstí být v bezpečném Vaultu, správce.

String.Source: So damned hungry. Maybe I'll get another drink.
Never thought I'd be an honest to goodness Vault Dweller. Huh.
String.Dest: !Nikdy jsem nemyslel, že bych přijal dobrotu obyvatel Vaultu. Huh.

String.Source: Look, I'm just doing my job.
Is this what the Old World smelled like? Weird.
I just can't lose.
Free soda. Gotta love the Vault.
You know, everything the Overseer says... just makes sense. Right?
String.Dest: !Však víš, všechno, co správce řekne... dává smysl. Dobře?

String.Source: Aren't Vaults supposed to have clean water?
I figured the last thing I'd be worried about in a Vault is finding a place to sleep.
String.Dest: !Myslel jsem, že to poslední, čeho bych se ve Vaultu obával, je najít místo na spaní.

String.Source: What? Is the damned thing rigged?
I hope the light isn't too bright.
Why blue? I mean, would a yellow jumpsuit really be THAT bad?
String.Dest: !Proč modrá? Myslíš, že žlutá kombinéza by vypadala špatně?

String.Source: This eye thing is just... weird.
I wonder how high the Vault numbers go...
String.Dest: !Zajímalo by mě, jak vysoko jdou čísla Vaultů...

String.Source: Huh. Guess you're our... Overseer?
You feel that? This eye thing's burning up.
String.Dest: !Cítíš to? Ta věc se nějak zahřívá.

String.Source: This thing's making my head hurt.
The Power Cycle... ain't all bad.
Was that... a word? Nah.
My eyes... I keep seein' flashes.
This soda is like... drinking sunshine. Or rainbows!
String.Dest: !Tato soda je jako... tekutý sluneční svit. Nebo duha!

String.Source: Feels kind of good. Helping people's eyes, that is.
String.Dest: !Je to dobrý pocit. Pomáhat lidem se zrakem, to je to.

String.Source: I guess my eyes are worth... this.
String.Dest: !Myslím si, že to má svou cenu... když ztratíš zrak.

String.Source: Glad I'm in here and not out there...
Exercise sucks.
Haha. I win again.
All this pedaling... there's a point to it, right?
String.Dest: !Tohle šlapání... zřejmě to má svůj smysl, že jo?

String.Source: No one's going to be happy until we get a proper meal down here.
String.Dest: !Nikdo nebude šťastný, pokud sem dolů nedostaneme pořádné jídlo.

String.Source: So this thing can fix my eyes?
String.Dest: !Takže tato věc může opravit můj zrak?

String.Source: We're in a Vault. Woah! *chuckle*
Oww... Dammit. The cycle did it again.
String.Dest: !Au... Sakra. To kolo to udělalo znovu.

String.Source: This thing gives me the creeps.
C'mon. It's got to pay out sometime.
I'm trying out some new flavors today.
Sure, the water outside could make you glow... But at least you could drink.
String.Dest: !Ano, z vody na povrchu můžeš zářit... trochu se ale napít můžeš.

String.Source: My stomach don't feel good.
Easiest job I ever had.
So I just keep pedaling?
Got to get more of this, woah... Colors!
I'm so bored.
What was that? "Obey"?
Don't people eat in these Vaults?
I hate this damned... thing.
Ehh... I feel terrible.
Please, Overseer, we could really use something to eat.
String.Dest: !Prosím, správce, něco k jídlu by se opravdu hodilo.

String.Source: Everyone's tired. We need more beds down here.
String.Dest: !Všichni jsou unaveni, potřebujeme tu víc postelí.

String.Source: Aren't Vaults supposed to have beds?
String.Dest: !Neměly by být Vaulty postelema již vybaveny?

String.Source: We need some water. Soon.
Just need... to... keep... going.
My luck's gonna turn around.
I should be hungry. But the thought of food...
String.Dest: Asi by moje tělo mělo mít pocit hladu, ale pomyslím-li na jídlo...

String.Source: I can't think of anything right now. Sorry, boss.
String.Dest: !Teď nemám na nic myšlenky, lituji, šéfe.

String.Source: Okay.
I cannot work without the terminal on my Overseer's Desk.
String.Dest: !Bez terminálu na mém stolu správce, nemůže pracovat.

String.Source: I'm sorry, but I need my Overseer's Desk.
String.Dest: !Je mi líto, ale potřebuji můj stůl správceho.

String.Source: I must have my desk in order to continue our work.
String.Dest: !Potřebuji svůj stůl, jinak nemůžu v práci pokračovat.

String.Source: You got to try this... slot machine. It's the best.
String.Dest: Musíš zkusit tento... automat. Je nejlepší.

String.Source: Did the machine just say "degenerate"?
String.Dest: Jak můžeš o tomhle stroji říct, že je "pokažený"?

String.Source: Haha. I win again.
My luck's gonna turn around.
What? Is the damned thing rigged?
String.Dest: Co? Není ta zatracená věc zmanipulovaná?

String.Source: I just can't lose.
The thing's broke. It keeps making weird clicking noises.
String.Dest: Ta věc je rozbitá. Neustále dělá podivné cvakavé zvuky.

String.Source: Are slot machines supposed to flash?
My luck's gonna turn around.
What? Is the damned thing rigged?
String.Dest: Co? Není ta zatracená věc zmanipulovaná?

String.Source: You got to try this... slot machine. It's the best.
String.Dest: Musíš zkusit tento... automat. Je nejlepší.

String.Source: I just can't lose.
Haha. I win again.
C'mon. It's got to pay out sometime.
String.Dest: No tááák. Jednou z toho ty prachy musí vypadnout.

String.Source: Are slot machines supposed to flash?
The thing's broke. It keeps making weird clicking noises.
String.Dest: Ta věc je rozbitá. Neustále dělá podivné cvakavé zvuky.

String.Source: Did the machine just say "degenerate"?
String.Dest: Jak můžeš o tomhle stroji říct, že je "pokažený"?

String.Source: Haha. I win again.
My luck's gonna turn around.
C'mon. It's got to pay out sometime.
String.Dest: No tááák. Jednou z toho ty prachy musí vypadnout.

String.Source: My luck's gonna turn around.
Haha. I win again.
